pages.text: While this dimension may seem peaceful at first, its serenity is disrupted by a $(thing)cold undertone of danger$(). Fearsome creatures dwell in these woods, from the unruly $(entity)Naga$() to the rotting $(entity)Lich$(). Underground there is peril as well, because slumbering beneath in their charred nests are ancient $(entity)Dragons$(). Only the foolish or very well-equipped adventurer would seek out their riches - or even their precious $(item)eggs$().

pages.title: The Dark Forest
pages.text: In this land of perpetual dimness, strange wonders can be found.

To get to the $(place)Twilight Forest$(), one need only $(action)create a pool$() of four $(item)water source blocks$(), surrounded by $(item)flowers$(), and $(action)throw a $(item)diamond$() into the center.$(br2)It may seem daunting - but stepping into the pool is not particularly painful. Merely a bit $(thing)tingly$(). In my experience, traveling to this land was significantly less uncomfortable than to many of the others!
